posts.title: BREAKING: The ways people hear about big news these days; 'into a million pieces,' says source
posts.content: It’s not often that massive political news breaks on a Sunday afternoon — especially one in steamy late July, the leading edge of the Greater August vacation season. But break news Joe Biden most certainly did with this tweet announcing he would not run for reelection this fall.
